title: Update hero/quiz photos and remove Letter/Moments sections while preserving Closing dedication

requirements.summary: Add uploaded photos as static assets and use the second photo as the Hero image with existing fallback preserved.
acceptanceCriteria: The second uploaded image (WhatsApp Image 2026-02-11 at 7.14.23 AM (1).jpeg) is available in frontend/public/assets/generated as sona-hero-photo.dim_1600x2000.jpg (or equivalent dimensioned filename)
HeroSection renders the new hero photo from /assets/generated/sona-hero-photo.dim_1600x2000.jpg
HeroSection retains its existing fallback UI if the hero photo cannot be loaded

file_operations.description: Add the second uploaded photo as a generated static asset at this exact path and filename (source: WhatsApp Image 2026-02-11 at 7.14.23 AM (1).jpeg).
Ensure the Hero section uses /assets/generated/sona-hero-photo.dim_1600x2000.jpg as the primary image while keeping the current onError-driven fallback UI behavior intact.

requirements.summary: Show the first uploaded photo as a visually secondary side image within the Quiz section without breaking mobile responsiveness.
acceptanceCriteria: The first uploaded image (WhatsApp Image 2026-02-11 at 7.14.23 AM.jpeg) is available in frontend/public/assets/generated as sona-quiz-side-photo.dim_1200x1600.jpg (or equivalent dimensioned filename)
QuizSection layout shows the quiz content with a side image on desktop (e.g., in a two-column layout) and stacks gracefully on mobile (no overflow/cutoff)
The side image uses an English alt attribute (e.g., "Sona") and is visually secondary to the quiz content

file_operations.description: Add the first uploaded photo as a generated static asset at this exact path and filename (source: WhatsApp Image 2026-02-11 at 7.14.23 AM.jpeg).

Update the Quiz section layout to include a smaller side image sourced from /assets/generated/sona-quiz-side-photo.dim_1200x1600.jpg (alt text in English, e.g., "Sona"), rendered in a two-column layout on desktop and stacked below/above content on mobile without overflow; keep quiz logic, scoring, and celebration behavior unchanged.

requirements.summary: Remove Letter and Moments sections from the main page flow and navigation while preserving the Closing dedication paragraph exactly.
acceptanceCriteria: The Letter section (id="letter") is no longer rendered in the main page flow
The Moments section (id="moments") is no longer rendered in the main page flow
The Closing section still renders dedicationContent.closing.message and dedicationContent.closing.signature exactly as before
Top navigation no longer shows links to removed sections (e.g., remove/disable "Message" and "Moments" buttons), and remaining links still smooth-scroll correctly

file_operations.description: Remove rendering of LetterSection and MomentsSection from the main page flow while keeping HeroSection, QuizSection, and ClosingSection in place.

Remove (or disable) navigation buttons that scroll to the removed sections ("Message" for id="letter" and "Moments" for id="moments"), ensuring remaining links (Hero, Quiz, Closing) still smooth-scroll correctly.
